system.name: Dwarven Runecraft
system.overview: Three steps: Pattern, Inscribe, Binding. Any natural roll 95 to 100 on a test triggers Misfire. Ward-Mesh active reduces misfire roll by 10, minimum 1.

sustain.missed_day_rule: Each missed day adds 5 to the next misfire roll until upkeep is performed

table.effect: Nearest character gains 1 Stress and suffers -5 Perception for 10 minutes.
Crafter takes 1 damage ignoring armor. Non-dwarf must pass corruption check TN 45 or gain 1 Corruption.
If on structure, set delayed_crack tag; first heavy shock causes a fracture test at TN 50. If on gear, reduce durability by 1.
Crafter is knocked prone and Immobilized for 1 round. If inscribing footwear, wearer is stuck for 1 round.

runes.name: Bind-Light
runes.pattern_hint: Three short lines crossing a circle

success.effect: Creates steady white work-light radius 6 meters
success.notes: On leather, becomes a wearable charm; on stone or metal, fixed sconce

failure.effect: Flicker; half radius 3 meters; duration 10 minutes

success.effect: Reinforces seam or keystone. Collapse checks in a 3 meter span gain -10 TN
success.notes: While a character is braced against the reinforced surface, they gain +1 Wound Threshold

failure.effect: No reinforcement; next structural test gains +5 TN due to flawed seam

runes.name: Ward-Mesh Field
runes.pattern_hint: Hash of short diagonals over a ring

success.effect: Projects a field similar to Ward-Mesh Lantern, radius 3 meters, suppresses whisper auras and grants -10 TN to stealth against them
success.notes: Multiple fields do not stack; the highest applies

failure.effect: Sputter; field radius 1 meter; duration 2 minutes; next test within field at -5 TN

success.effect: Wearer gains advantage to resist shove and knockdown; as a 1 action toggle, become Immovable for 1 round
costs: While Immovable, apply -10 Mobility for that round

failure.effect: Sticking; first attempt to move next round is at -10 Mobility

success.effect: Safely disables one visible rune of equal or lower TN

failure.effect: Backlash; perform a misfire roll with a +5 bonus to the roll
